description: Your ability to see the pattern behind a series of data points.  Allows you to ask questions that you otherwise couldn't ask and find things you might have missed otherwise.

level_descriptions_theory.description: You can't even think yourself out of a paper bag.
You get the gist of playing a round of chess.
You realized that one weird tabloid paper you've read a long time ago might have been correct all this time.
You probably know how to deduce an electronic lock's password.
You can easily rule out non-magickal causes in a given situation.
You're aware of more supernatural happenings than everyone else.
You know even what you don't know.

level_descriptions_practice.description: You can't even solve a simple Sudoku puzzle.
You can deduce the whereabouts of your missing item in your house.
You solve murder mysteries in the first chapter.
You can figure out the workings of the world mundane and supernatural from some observations.
You're basically modern day Sherlock Holmes.
No secret is safe from you.
Even the unknowable unknowns are known to you.
